Package com.example.syntaxeventlottery

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
com.example.syntaxeventlottery.UserController
public class UserController extends Object
The UserController class handles operations related to user management. It acts as a mediator between the UserRepository and the rest of the application, managing user data validation, CRUD operations, and location updates.

      Adds a new user to the repository.
      Parameters:
      user - The User to add.
      imageUri - The profile image URI of the user (nullable).
      callback - The callback to handle the result of the operation.

      Parameters:
      user - The User to update.
      imageUri - The new profile image URI of the user (nullable).

      user - The User whose location is to be updated.

      longitude - The longitude of the new location.
